data.message:
We didn't  see you making a photo for Palestine or Syria , Why racism ?? 
#PrayForGaza

replies.message: Why should they make a photo for Palastinian terror ?
He meant israeli terrorism against palestinian victims ;)

Why shouldn't they make a phot for the people suffering? Getting killed, kids, women and men, why only make a photo for Paris, France. Not for Syria, Palestine, and all the other  countries. Of course, this is sad, but why only make one photo for one country, when many other countries  have suffered for many years?
Nadine Nasereddin take another look at your FB wall, where there is an Israeli flag burning with the hashtag burn_in_hell... Who is the terrorist ?

Lets try asking you a logical question:
A 13 years old kid leaves his home with a 30cm knife, tries to stab a woman on the street that he can FREELY walk in (occupation? Where?), kid gets shot (he was holding a very long knife, after all).
Isn't that how law enforcement goes?

The comparison between Syria and "Palestine" alone serves to show the ignorance of facts and the brain-washing that people, specially Muslim, undergoes- with some help from social networks like FB, of course.
In Syria alone, more than 1700 people were killed only in October (!). 
In Israel, how many "Palestinens" were killed? And why? Because they held a knife to stab an innocent bystander? 
Because they shot a man who preached for co-existence in a bus within Jerusalem? 
It is you, those who would compare between Palestine and Syria, that contribute to the continuation of this conflict. Under the guise of Human-Rights you set out to complete a task that was set thousands of years ago. But we here in Israel say to you, "Never again". So forget it :)

Listen me  ,  In the last war between Hamas and the Zion Army , many kids were killed , women , Homes were crashed . Israel is No 1 Terrorist in M.E more than ISIS , Just see how Israel came to being ; Hagana .. etc . And the Palestinians who r fighting against the Zions , they are just fighting for their rights in their own country , Israel stole the Muslim land ..
Guy Tal He is fighting for his country that is stolen by Israel and excuse me , No women were killed , Most of the killed are men that oppress the Muslims
I challenge  you to say what is happening  in Israeli jails
Palestine is from Hiva till Gaza
You are thieves
@omer melech Once again, you are .
Should I answer your questions? It does seems like you're answering them yourself.
Moataz Ziad thank you for all the blessings
And France when they took rule of Algeria 10 million Muslims were killed .
Omer Melech Welcome  Bro ❤
Play victim racist card again you piece of crap.
Bruno Teix Thank you 😂😂

Instead I would try to build my nation, wherever it is. Not sit and cry in my "refugees camps" for 70 years.
The muslims think that violance is a solution. And dont tell me not all of them beacuse we had enough from you to know
There is no place calls palastain
Israel came to being by violence so it would not be removed except by violence

Maybe it is we are tired of trying to fight your war for you and getting our soldiers killed every day and funding it too. Trying to train troops there and being turned on by the ones we are training. May God Bless You.
Keep praying dear it got you this far so don't stop now

Israel is one of the very few LEGITIMATE countries in the world, coming to existence by declarations, agreements with world nations, right of return, and of course some armed struggle with the British who had control over the region. In fact, there was never a Palestinian state, kingdom, country or anything of the likes.
